articles.author: Ben Kamisar
articles.title: Sen. Marsha Blackburn announces she's running for governor in Tennessee - NBC News
articles.description: Sen. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., is running for governor, she announced Wednesday, promising to help her state be "America’s conservative leader" for generations to come.
articles.content:
Sen. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., is running for governor, she announced Wednesday, promising to help her state be "Americas conservative leader" for generations to come.

articles.author: Sophie Tanno
articles.title: American journalist found after going missing on hike in Norwegian national park - CNN
articles.description: American journalist Alec Luhn, who went missing while hiking in a Norwegian national park, has been found alive, according to the Norwegian Red Cross.
articles.content:
American journalist Alec Luhn, who went missing while hiking in a Norwegian national park, has been found alive, according to the Norwegian Red Cross.
Luhn was found near Folgefonna National Park by… [+2018 chars]
